title: Drawing, "Penelope Dreams of Ulysses Return;  Minerva accompanying Ulysses and Penelope to Thalamus; Study for a Figure of Penelope"
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: inscribed on recto: penelope sogna larivo di Ulisse detto da Minerva; minerva consegna penelope a Ulisse che ritorna a suo talamo.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Penelope Dreams of Ulysses Return;  Minerva accompanying Ulysses and Penelope to Thalamus; Study for a Figure of Penelope".
Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1486.
